heading: Inferno Dungeon Guide
content: Although dungeons with Animus Carriers are often desirable for their high reward, Inferno requires extensive exploration to complete. The bloodstone is equally difficult to track down, but at least there's only one. Speaking of one, that is the number of times we recommend completing this dungeon. Doing so will reward you with the powerful, rogue-exclusive While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
